00051    template <int NAtom>
00052    class SpeciesGroup
00053    {
00054 
00055    public: 
00056      
00060       static const int NullIndex = -1;
00061 
00065       SpeciesGroup() 
00066        : typeId_(NullIndex)
00067       {
00068          for (int i=0; i < NAtom; ++i) {
00069             atomIds_[i] = NullIndex;
00070          }
00071       }
00072    
00079       void setAtomId(int i, int Id)
00080       { atomIds_[i] = Id; }
00081      
00087       void setTypeId(int typeId)
00088       { typeId_ = typeId; }
00089 
00095       int atomId(int i) const
00096       { return atomIds_[i]; }
00097     
00101       int typeId() const
00102       { return typeId_; }
00103    
00104       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00105 
00109       static void commitMpiType();
00110 
00111       #endif
00112 
00113    private:
00114       
00116       int    atomIds_[NAtom];
00117    
00119       int    typeId_;
00120    
00121    //friends:
00122 
00123       friend
00124       std::istream& 
00125       operator >> <> (std::istream& in, SpeciesGroup<NAtom>& speciesGroup);
00126 
00127       friend 
00128       std::ostream& 
00129       operator << <> (std::ostream& out, const SpeciesGroup<NAtom>& speciesGroup);
00130 
00131    };
00132
